Translations.Text: Tvoj Lord zauzlit lenze ona meditate two-thirds night half it one-third z it a so robi some z those kto verit ona! GOD ZAMYSLAT night DNI He ZAUZLIT ZE ONA VZDY NIE ROBIT this. He pardoned ona. Radsej ona read co ona mozem Quran. He zauzlit ze some z ona maj bol chory others cestovat pursuit GOD's provisions others striving zapricinit GOD Ona read co ona mozem it observe zmluva prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) lend GOD loan righteousness. Whatever dobre ona send ahead tvoj souls ona zalozit it GOD daleko lepsi generously rewarded A implore GOD forgiveness! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Let Mna deal s 1 ja created individuum
Lenze he bol greedy for inak
He stubbornly refused accept these proofs
